thread.title: 7,000 earthen lamps used for ‘Prem Ratan Dhan Payo’ ‘Jalte Diye’ song
thread.title_full: 7,000 earthen lamps used for ‘Prem Ratan Dhan Payo’ ‘Jalte Diye’ song

title: 7,000 earthen lamps used for ‘Prem Ratan Dhan Payo’ ‘Jalte Diye’ song
text: 7,000 earthen lamps used for ‘Prem Ratan Dhan Payo’ ‘Jalte Diye’ song Wednesday, 21 October 2015 (18 minutes ago) A new song "Jalte diye" from 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo', featuring Salman Khan and Sonam Kapoor, will mesmerise viewers with over 7,000 diyas (earthen lamps) picturised in the sequence. Salman Khan and Sonam Kapoor share a promising chemistry in the title song Prem Ratan Dhan Payo from their family entertainer movie. The video of the song is finally out. Watch this video to find out more. Recent related news A song from the film 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo' has used over 7,000 diyas Zee News 40 minutes ago - Lifestyle Mumbai, Oct 21 : Even as superstar Salman Khan's "Prem Ratan Dhan Payo" continues to create immense hype ahead of its release, a new song titled "Jalte diye"... newKerala.com 43 minutes ago - Entertainment You Might Like Comments Twitter Vishwa Gujarat 7,000 Earthen Lamps Used For ‘Prem Ratan…’ Song https://t.co/4IYXP9BNGl @KillWidSarcasm https://t.co/4g6pPUf6tm 1 minute ago Klaus Kaufmann 7,000 earthen lamps used for ‘Prem Ratan Dhan Payo’ song https://t.co/p6Z70NBY0q 8 minutes ago Bollywood Fan Mumbai, Oct 21 (IANS) Even as superstar Salman Khan's "Prem Ratan Dhan Payo" continues to create immense hype... https://t.co/h9S9R74N5C 10 minutes ago Bollywood Fan 7,000 earthen lamps used for ‘Prem Ratan…’ song https://t.co/3xm2UXCwK9 https://t.co/r6WSyo2vXF 10 minutes ago Bollywood Fan 7,000 earthen lamps used for ‘Prem Ratan…’ song https://t.co/3xm2UXCwK9 10 minutes ago Leah Walter 7,000 earthen lamps used for ‘Prem Ratan Dhan Payo’ song https://t.co/DeBd5L4rQe 10 minutes ago
